title: Low FPS and Graphical Glitches on MacOS Sierra
body:
I am having some graphical glitches in loading screen with horizontal distortions moving up and down the screen after updating to MacOS Sierra from OSX El Capitan. This seems to be fixed by tabbing out and back in. I have seen another user report the same issue. I am also experiencing significantly lower fps, from about 75 fps to about 20 after updating with the same settings. This is on a 15 inch 2015 Macbook Pro with M370X discrete gpu. Any help would be greatly appreciated as it is making the game almost unplayable for me.

Thanks in advance.

replies.body: I'm having low FPS as well. Is this going to be fixed hopefully soon?

YES! this is a struggle for me also, i have many friends who want to update their software, but dont, because they know it destroys the fps in league. Riot Games, please look into this ongoing problem, it has been over a year :O
This is still an issue after a year and continues to High Sierra 10.13. Let's try to fix this year-old issue!

replies.poster: S C I E N C 3
replies.body: Im having the same issue...... Enabling vsync helps the graphic issue but then your mouse goes all crazy...
I'm experiencing similar issues with my Mac since the update to Sierra. Mouse and graphical glitches are happening frequently and my FPS had dropped by over 70% as well. Please look into this guys!

Since I dowloaded OS Sierra I'm having enourmous FPS problems as well. When I start it will be normal with about 60 FPS but then a few seconds after I start the game it slows down to around 8 FPS. Its impossible to play. I've tried everything: Closing applications, changing in-game settings, repairing corrupt game files, SMC Reset, AND NVRAM Reset. Nothing is working....
I'm having the same problem.. i did all that.. and low fps... I'm at the point that I'm thinking of reverting back to el capitan
Same. I was getting around 70 fps on medium-high on El Cap and now I'm getting barely 40 on medium on Sierra.

Since macOS Sierra just came out, there are bound to be some issues here are there, but I think there are some steps that can be taken that may resolve this. First, I'd run through the steps in our [FPS troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#section-mac), as they address a lot of solutions for display-related issues on the mac client.

If you continue to have issues after working through those steps, please let me know.

hi i did all the steps in the guide and still have 60-80 fps. Normally i have 144...  Its a new iMac (end 2015). 

The problems appeared with macOS Sierra :(

No idea what i can do more ...

It looks like the display of the 2015 iMac is running at 60Hz, so anything over 60fps will not really be visually noticeable. I recommend capping your FPS at 60, then enabling vertical sync for the best experience. If you wish to regain your previous FPS, I recommend reverting back to El Capitan from Sierra until League is more optimized for Sierra.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
